snippet: Lotus showed it is ready to be a regular Formula One points contender, as it shook off a dismal start to the season with an encouraging performance at Sunday's Malaysian Grand Prix....

headline.print_headline: Lotus Re-emerges as F1 Points Contender
headline.main: Lotus Re-emerges as F1 Points Contender

lead_paragraph: Lotus showed it is ready to be a regular Formula One points contender, as it shook off a dismal start to the season with an encouraging performance at Sunday's Malaysian Grand Prix.
